mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, A.NOTI_CD, A.NOTI_TITLE, A.AD_ID, A.NOTI_DATE, A.NOTI_VIEW, A.NOTI_PIN FROM ( SELECT N.NOTI_CD, N.NOTI_TITLE, AI.AD_ID, N.NOTI_DATE, N.NOTI_VIEW, N.NOTI_PIN FROM NOTI N LEFT JOIN AD_INFO AI ON N.AD_CD = AI.AD_CD ORDER BY (CASE WHEN NOTI_PIN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) DESC, NOTI_DATE ASC )A ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
SELECT N.NOTI_CD, N.NOTI_DATE, AI.AD_ID, N.NOTI_PIN, N.NOTI_TITLE, N.NOTI_CONT FROM NOTI N LEFT JOIN AD_INFO AI ON N.AD_CD = AI.AD_CD WHERE N.NOTI_CD = #{noti_cd }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTI(NOTI_CD, AD_CD, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONT, NOTI_VIEW, NOTI_PIN) VALUES(NOTI_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ad_cd}, #{noti_title}, #{noti_cont}, 0, #{noti_pin})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, QA.QNA_CD, QA.QNA_TITLE, QA.AD_ANSR, QA.USER_NAME, QA.QNA_DATE, QA.QNA_VIEW FROM ( SELECT Q.QNA_CD, Q.QNA_TITLE, DECODE(AA.AD_ANSR_CD, NULL , '-', '완료') "AD_ANSR" , UI.USER_NAME, Q.QNA_DATE, Q.QNA_VIEW FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN AD_ANSR AA ON Q.QNA_CD = AA.QNA_CD LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON Q.USER_DSTN_CD = UI.USER_DSTN_CD ORDER BY (CASE WHEN AD_ANSR = '완료' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) DESC, QNA_DATE ASC ) QA ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_TITLE, UI.USER_NAME, UI.USER_ID, Q.QNA_CD, Q.QNA_DATE, Q.QNA_CONT, AA.AD_ANSR_CD, AA.AD_ANSR_CONT, AA.AD_ANSR_DATE FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON Q.USER_DSTN_CD = UI.USER_DSTN_CD LEFT JOIN AD_ANSR AA ON Q.QNA_CD = AA.QNA_CD WHERE Q.QNA_CD = #{qna_cd }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AD_ANSR(AD_ANSR_CD, AD_CD, QNA_CD, AD_ANSR_CONT, AD_ANSR_DATE) VALUES(AD_ANSR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ad_cd }, #{qna_cd }, #{ad_ansr_cont }, SYSDATE)
